children: Designed and implemented efficient data structures for a real-time gaming server
Optimized memory usage in a resource-constrained environment
Developed responsive web applications using HTML5, CSS3, and JavaScript
Integrated RESTful APIs for dynamic content
Built a recommendation system using collaborative filtering techniques
Trained deep learning models for image classification tasks
Designed and optimized relational database schemas for e-commerce platforms
Implemented database replication for high availability and fault tolerance
Conducted penetration testing to identify vulnerabilities in web applications
Developed a secure authentication system with multi-factor authentication (MFA)
Deployed scalable applications on AWS cloud infrastructure
